name: Used Spa Lot
overview:
UsedSpaLot.com is a marketplace to buy and sell used spas / used hot tubs. You may also find new spas and hot tubs for sale.

Since 1998 Used Spa Lotâ€™s parent company has been “putting products in the path of people doing what they do”, in both retail stores and the web. As the website grew to astronomical proportions, the focus became “the focused shopper”. While researching a major purchase was the primary use of the Internet - it quickly became a way for Sellers in one corner of the country and Buyers in another to come together.

The Used _ Lot concept is a take from the old trusted Used Car Lot that was a corner stone in every town and city across the country. Where buyers are looking for a great value, and sellers are looking to move inventory with the lowest sales cost. Now the web becomes the street that old trusted lot resides. Each Used _ Lot will have itâ€™s own personality and will talk in plain talk (sometimes even down right funny). We will also strive to tell it like it is - since we are not affiliated with any manufacturers or retailers, UsedSpaLot will not twist language in a way that blurs the truth. Weâ€™re consumers too.

By focusing on niche markets - buyers and sellers do not have to fight for exposure in an environment of literally millions of items that have nothing to do with what they are looking for.
